OrgName.entry: BLACK SELF HELP MENTORING SERVICE - BLACK PALM

Desc.entry: Aims to provide those from black and minority ethnic communities with support, focusing particularly on engaging young people aged from 7-17 years in learning and self development and empowering them to achieve their potential. One-to-one mentoring support available. Also provides a family support service. Seeks to make links with other community/voluntary organisations. Also involved in projects with other ethnic communities.

category.entry: BLACK AND MINORITY ETHNIC PEOPLE - GENERAL SUPPORT ORGANISATIONS
